Articles.Content:
Hey

I read the tweet from KSP saying the livestream is today 0:00GMT, could anyone really tell me when that's, CET?

Thaaanks :9

http://www.lmgtfy.com/?q=GMT+to+CET

There you go :-).

If you don't feel like following the link - CET = GMT +2.00 hours atm, so 0:00 GMT = 2:00 CET

http://www.lmgtfy.com/?q=GMT+to+CET

There you go :-).

If you don't feel like following the link - CET = GMT +2.00 hours atm, so 0:00 GMT = 2:00 CET

Dang, that late..

Do you know if it's a normal livestream? Will they release .22? or what is it about?
There's supposed to be a 0.22 experimental build marathon after the stream. Also it starts at 11 p.m. GMT so that's 1 a.m. CET.
That's 6pm for me (EST = GMT -5). Damnit, I might not be home by then.
Livestream at 00:00? Damn, it's gonna be a long night for me!

Kerbal Space Program Ã¢â‚¬Â@KerbalSpaceP

Squadcast as usual broadcasting at 18:00 CDT/23:00 GMT!
Guys is this on the Kerbal twitch TV place or somewhere else?

There's supposed to be a 0.22 experimental build marathon after the stream. Also it starts at 11 p.m. GMT so that's 1 a.m. CET.

I'm confused. What time is the build marathon?
Will there be a replay on youtube or something? Im gonna miss it. Are there previous ones somewhere?

Will there be a replay on youtube or something? Im gonna miss it. Are there previous ones somewhere?

Twitch usually saves livestreams so you most likely will be able to watch it if you go to their twitch channel and click on videos.

Squadcast is live now!

Come and watch!

http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv

Hooray for revised SAS! E: Also those landing legs!

Edited October 11, 2013 by regex
Thanks. Would've missed it!

Hooray for revised SAS! E: Also those landing legs!

.... Whackjob sized landing legs? Please explain for those of us at office and unable to watch / hear!

.... Whackjob sized landing legs? Please explain for those of us at office and unable to watch / hear!

Nah, the mediums have been completely redesigned and the large ones have been slightly changed. They now come with a suspension of sorts and will damage in the same manner as wheels. You're still on your own as far as enormous landing legs, buddy.
Scienceeeeee!!! Biomes on the Mun!!! So much awesomeness in this update
Down with the evil runway! (They made the runway slope even smoother.)

Nah, the mediums have been completely redesigned and the large ones have been slightly changed. They now come with a suspension of sorts and will damage in the same manner as wheels. You're still on your own as far as enormous landing legs, buddy.

Hrm. So the Whackification progress of Squad is still zero. I'd better double down.
Any other updates? Any new information? Can a brother update the Whack?
Yes, can I please have an abridged recap of the stuff that was shown, if someone has the time? I would have liked to have caught the stream but I got in literally 5 minutes before the end.

So, it looks like from watching the casts:

* Crawler tracks actually go further up to the launchpad

* Lightbulb icon in R&D is for some SCIENCE parts

* (Preliminary) 1st node gives a decoupler, bigger and smaller tank, smaller more efficient engine. Next few have more science, radial decoupler, bigger SRB, winglets...

* It's pretty easy to get past the 0th node in R&D

* Runway has shallower slopes, and lights

* Island runway is now sand, new hangars, can climb up and be inside control tower

* R&D building has a wind tunnel structure, mission control in new spot, Kerbals seem to have a thing for hexagons

* Recruitment building has the new background scene

It's mostly stuff we've already heard/seen.

- Revamped landing legs

- Better SAS functionality (finally!)

- R&D Facility and new KSP look

- Revised island runway and main runway lights

- SCIENCE

- Explanation of biomes

- Some boring flying around

- etc...

Watch it once it's archived on Twitch.

- Tech tree has music, pretty cool.

- astronaut complex has a new background and music
Went to the link, hung out for an hour or so, shared pictures, met a kindred spirit "EJ" who also likes to build big.
